McLaughlin went 2-of-2 on field-goal attempts and 2-of-2 on extra-point tries in Sunday's 24-20 loss to the Saints.
Egbuka secured two of nine targets for 15 yards in the Buccaneers' 24-20 loss to the Saints on Sunday.
Godwin brought in five of eight targets for 55 yards in the Buccaneers' 24-20 loss to the Saints on Sunday.
Mayfield completed 14 of 30 passes for 122 yards with a touchdown and an interception while adding six rushes for 42 yards in the Buccaneers' 24-20 loss to the Saints on Sunday.
Irving rushed 15 times for 55 yards and brought in two of three targets for 26 yards a touchdown in the Buccaneers' 24-20 loss to the Saints on Sunday.
Reddick (ankle) is questionable to return to Sunday's contest against New Orleans, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.
Smith (neck) is questionable to return to Sunday's contest against the Saints, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.
Bredeson (knee) has been ruled out for the rest of Sunday's game against the Saints, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.
Wirfs (oblique) is inactive for Sunday's Week 14 clash against New Orleans, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.
Morrison (hamstring) is inactive for Sunday's Week 14 tilt against New Orleans, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.
Bazelak (coach's decision) is inactive and serving as Tampa Bay's emergency third QB against the Saints in Week 14, Scott Smith of the Buccaneers' official site reports.

Evans (collarbone) will remain out for Sunday's game against the Saints but is pushing to return from injured reserve and could be activated ahead of next Thursday's contest versus the Falcons, Adam Schefter of ESPN reports.
Wisdom (quadriceps) is out for Sunday's game versus New Orleans, River Wells of Sports Illustrated reports.
McMillan (neck) won't return for Sunday's game against the Saints, Adam Schefter of ESPN reports.
Shepard brought in one of two targets for five yards in the Buccaneers' 20-17 win over the Cardinals on Sunday.
David compiled six total tackles (four solo) in Sunday's 20-17 win over the Cardinals.
Dennis recorded 11 total tackles (eight solo) in Sunday's 20-17 win over Arizona.
Winfield recorded seven total tackles (four solo) and an interception in Sunday's 20-17 win over the Cardinals.

TEN.short_comment: Helm caught one of two targets for eight yards in Sunday's 31-29 win over Cleveland.
Slye connected on his only field-goal attempt and all four of his extra-point tries in Sunday's 31-29 win over the Browns.
Okonkwo caught both of his targets for 20 yards in Sunday's 31-29 win over the Browns.
Ayomanor caught one of three targets for a 14-yard touchdown Sunday in a 31-29 victory versus Cleveland.
Dike brought in five of eight targets for 24 yards and a touchdown, returned one kickoff for 41 yards and ran back one punt for minus-2 yards in the Titans' 31-29 win over the Browns on Sunday.
Spears rushed eight times for 19 yards and secured two of four targets for 28 yards in the Titans' 31-29 win over the Browns on Sunday.
Ward completed 14 of 28 passes for 117 yards with two touchdowns and one interception while adding two carries for four yards in the Titans' 31-29 win over the Browns on Sunday.
Pollard rushed 25 times for 161 yards and two touchdowns in the Titans' 31-29 win over the Browns on Sunday.

Brooks (concussion) is good to go for Tennessee's matchup versus the Browns on Sunday.
Hooker (ribs) was a full participant at Wednesday's practice.
Winston posted eight tackles (five solo), including 1.0 sacks, during the Titans' 25-3 loss to the Jaguars on Sunday.
Gray posted nine tackles (seven solo) during the Titans' 25-3 loss to the Jaguars on Sunday.
Jefferson recorded three catches on four targets for 20 yards in Sunday's 25-3 loss to the Jaguars.
Williams (illness) is active for Sunday's game against the Jaguars, Turron Davenport of ESPN.com reports.
Kinsey (coach's decision) is inactive for Sunday's matchup with the Jaguars.
Woods (hamstring) is active for Sunday's game against the Jaguars.
Joseph-Day (elbow) doesn't carry an injury designation into Sunday's game against the Jaguars.
Elam signed with the Titans on Wednesday, Jim Wyatt of the Titans' official site reports.
Barton logged three tackles (one solo) during the Titans' 30-24 loss to the Seahawks on Sunday.
Key posted two solo tackles, including 1.0 sacks and an additional QB hit, during the Titans' 30-24 loss to the Seahawks on Sunday.

WAS.short_comment: Coach Dan Quinn said after Sunday's 31-0 loss at Minnesota that Daniels (left elbow) could have returned to the game, but it was a coach's decision to keep him on the sideline, Ben Standig of Big 100 Washington D.C. reports.
Coach Dan Quinn noted after Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings that Ertz is feared to have torn his ACL, Ian Rapoport of NFL Network reports.
Brown caught one of two targets for 19 yards in Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings.
Samuel caught four of six targets for 27 yards in Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings.
McLaurin caught three of six targets for 41 yards in Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings.
Rodriguez gained 52 rushing yards on 10 carries in Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings.
Mariota completed two of four passes for 30 yards and an interception in Sunday's 31-0 loss to the Vikings. He added seven rushing yards on two carries and also lost a fumble.
Johnson (coach's decision) is inactive for Sunday's game against the Vikings but will serve as the Commanders' emergency third quarterback.
Wagner (knee) is active for Sunday's game against the Vikings.

McNichols rushed six times for 30 yards and caught both of his targets for zero yards in Sunday night's 27-26 overtime loss to the Broncos.

Burks caught one of four targets for a five-yard touchdown in Sunday night's 27-26 overtime loss to the Broncos.
Croskey-Merrit gained 20 yards on four carries in the Commanders' 27-26 overtime loss to the Broncos on Sunday night.
